Reviews.Content: hotel ideal arrived train turin confusion actually hotel gare de lyon ramp appeared direct route hotel luggage 27 steps reach entrance level front station walk slope cross street hotel staff helpful telling station hotel food cafe awful

Reviews.Title: “far to lacking to be a 3 star - even in paris”

Reviews.Content: space paris premium hotel space doesnt service beds awful slanted lumpy feel sliding sheets tacky holes pillows terrible bathrooms plastic floor wall hospital towels plugs dont cleaned 4pm daily serious disappointment sleep

Reviews.Title: “Still good, but not great anymore”

Reviews.Content: returned stay novotel gare de lyon liked starting lot wear tear toilet looked clean smelled bit layout makes impossible completely clean walls disturbing dark red spots bed comfortable accommodate 4 people nice extra travelling 2 breakfast happy organic yogurts found buffet paid 129 inclusive breakfast found excellent value located hotel paris
